metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19143 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 4.0.x before 4.0.33, 5.0.x before 5.0.31, and 6.0.x before 6.0.13 allows an authenticated user to delete files via a modified submission form because upload caching is mishandled.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.13-1').
